value:
select Parties_id,
Parties_Rut,
Parties_name,
party_subtype_cd,
pary_type_cd,
party_type_desc,
src_sys_cd,
max_sid from(
select src.Parties_id,
src.Parties_Rut,
src.Parties_name,
src.party_subtype_cd,
src.pary_type_cd,
src.party_type_desc,
src.src_sys_cd,
lkp_max_id.max_sid,
row_number()over(partition by src.Parties_id order by src.rec_crt_dtm desc) rnk from
(select distinct cast(ter_int_rut as integer) Parties_id,
cast(ter_int_rut as varchar(35)) Parties_Rut,
cast(ter_cha_nombre as varchar(100)) Parties_name,
cast(null as varchar(10)) party_subtype_cd,
cast(null as varchar(10)) pary_type_cd,
cast(null as varchar(80)) party_type_desc,
1 dummy,
'penta' src_sys_cd,
ter_int_rut as rec_crt_dtm
from cdp_ods.bd_sinie_x_sin_tercer
) src
left outer join
(select 1 dummy,max(dim_other_party_key) max_sid from cdp_dwh.dim_other_party_t) lkp_max_id
on src.dummy=lkp_max_id.dummy)
where rnk=1

SELECT dim_other_party_key,party_id,
src_sys_cd
FROM cdp_dwh.dim_other_party_t where src_sys_cd='penta'

name: Pre-sql
value:
delete from cdp_dwh.dim_other_party_t where src_sys_cd='penta';
commit;
